mapper.update: update user set college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_no = #{uNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u_id, college, gender, permission, sign_date, tag, u_name, u_no, detail, `password` from user
